attributes.action: to support a total moratorium on ivory sales at United Nations talks at Doha, Qatar in March 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on the Prime Minister to take a clear lead in opposing the proposals by Tanzania and Zambia to sell their ivory stocks, which will be voted on at the next meeting of the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species (CITES) in Qatar in March.
